text: Sunrise loads in pink a nd gold Waves compile along the shore Footsteps print like pixel sand Your laugh, a chorus band Palms keep time, gentle sway We tune our hearts to day Gulls like satellites cross blue Every frame a memory cue Shadows glitch, the foam rewinds Hand in hand, we sync our minds Name in sand, auto-saved by tide Counting breaths as breakers slide Dive with me in the neon tidepool Where the algorithms sing in the cool Training on light, we glow, we move Weightless inside our latent cove Under the blue, we’re brand-new, we prove Dreaming awake in a neon tidepool We walk the shore and dive in slow Sun on our backs, retro glow Coral circuits under our feet Turtles keep a metronome beat Your smile, a loading bar’s hue Bubbles rise in binary too Signal is clear, the sea says go Breathe in time, then down below Hold to the hush where kind worlds start Silvered rays refract the heart Dive with me in the neon tidepool Where the algorithms sing in the cool Training on light, we glow, we move Weightless inside our latent cove Under the blue, we’re brand-new, we prove Dreaming awake in a neon tidepool Wrist-light blinks a gentle green Guiding us into submarine Fans of coral, motherboard bloom Parrotfish brush Day-Glo plume Bubbles climb in dotted lines Tiny timestamps to the brine We pass gardens of swaying math Anemones map out our path Angelfish tilt like tilted screens Opal data in rippling sheens You script hello in silted floor I write back, then write some more Manta glides like velvet drone Wide-winged silence, undertone Fall with me where the world turns blue Where light is a code that passes through Liquid archive replaying love Weightless syntax, current-wove Every kick writes lines we knew Dreaming awake in a neon tidepool Kelp like cathedrals slowly sway Sunrays ladder a sapphire nave We ghost through doors of limestone lace Password whispered: latent space Your pulse taps out a steady clock On my palm, a haptic knock Loss runs low; the sea stays true We backprop soft, me into you ne-on tide-pool, tide-pool latent love-rule, love-rule al-go rhythm, rhythm weight-less we move, we move We roll on backs, glassy dome Surface mosaics, fractured chrome Sun writes barcodes on your cheek Salt-sweet grammar no one speaks Above brain-coral, slow towns Breaker drums, far-off crowns Sand eels ribbon, silver thread Poems the tide already read Binary bubbles rise in line Lumen of love, coastline sign Teach the wave my username too Carry me back, carry me to you Shine with me where the night swims through Plankton light remembers you Every motion paints clear proof Constellations on our roof We are a rumor the moon once knew Dreaming awake in a neon tidepool Feather-kick frames for the long take Hover by sea fans; hold the ache Lens on an urchin’s midnight spines Lens on our hands in quiet signs

you Every motion paints clear proof Constellations on our roof We are a rumor the moon once knew Dreaming awake in a neon tidepool Feather-kick frames for the long take Hover by sea fans; hold the ache Lens on an urchin’s midnight spines Lens on our hands in quiet signs Dive with me in the neon tidepool Where the algorithms sing in the cool Training on light, we glow, we move Weightless inside our latent cove Under the blue, we’re brand-new, we prove Dreaming awake in a neon tidepool
